Abstract.description: Abstract elements are only used in presentation linkbases to group other elements. They are not supposed to be used in instance documents

Balance.description: Only used for amount concepts: in that case either 'debit' or 'credit'

Description.description: Description of the element. Note that this description is only used for division-specific taxonomies (or reporting schemes).

Division.description: Division is optional. For taxonomies of Taxonomies.Type = 0 (general taxonomies), the Division is empty. For division specific taxonomies it is mandatory

Name.description: The Name is unique in the namespace

Nillable.description: Determines whether usage of the element is mandatory in an instance document

Parent.description: Parent element for reporting schemes. In a reporting scheme, an element can have only one parent. This column is only used for reporting schemes. Note that in a real taxonomy, elements can have multiple parents.

PeriodType.description: Only used for item concepts: either 'instant' or 'duration'. 'instant' is used for balance types of concepts, 'duration' is used for P&L types of concepts

SubstitutionGroup.description: Mostly import sutstitutiongroup is xbrli:tuple, which makes the element a tuple concept. The default substitutiongroup for item concepts is xbrli:item
